auditAndAdviceTexts.text1:
Transparency is an important part of any partnership. Therefore, the first step is to analyze your current situation.
 An experienced team verifies your online presence taking into account four essential points:
auditAndAdviceTexts.text2:
This first diagnosis is then presented to you during an advisory meeting and the second part of the audit is completed with you. The end result establishes <1>the starting point</1> for a potential collaboration, as well as clear Kpis to serve as the basis for evaluating the results in the months to come. After receiving this report, you can freely decide which services and software you want to use. Then, <3>a common strategy</3> will be defined and <5>clear objectives</5> are set.
 Often <7>an exterior view</7> of one's own business is very valuable, because in everyday work the point of view is often different or routine sets in. Thus, the audit is by no means a chain of criticism, but an objective analysis of different points on which the success of digitization can be assessed. All results are justified and supported by concrete examples.

card1.description: When the vehicle is pulled over in an inappropriate place:
card1.examples: Examples*: Vacant land, Visibility of the community (building, street, passerby...), Unorganized stockyard,...
card1.title: Constraints related to the place where the photos were taken

card2.description: When it has several storage locations or areas that are difficult to access:
card2.examples: Examples*: Organize the movement of the vehicle, Find where the vehicle is, Move several vehicles to pass, ...
card2.title: Constraints related to the operating site

card3.description: When the order of photos is never the same with little logic:
card3.examples: Examples*: Photo outdoors then indoors and again outdoors, Move the vehicle for each photo, ...
card3.title: Current Photo Sequence Constraints

report.optipixSlideText:
<0>The visual elements</0> determine the <0>first online impression</0>. They are especially decisive when selling via one or more marketplaces. The customer is overwhelmed with
countless product lines and loses the big picture. This is why it is very important that each ad contains real, quality and attractive photos. Here are some basic points to observe:
report.phototekText1: You can still access all of your photos in the media library. (Opti)Content stores original and edited photos. The database belongs to you and you can easily find your media content.
report.phototekText2: If desired, the database can be connected to your DMS/CRM/ERP via an API*.
report.processOptimalizationBottomRightText: <0>Optipix</0> is a simple APP that allows you to completely photograph a car in <2>15 minutes</2> without the need to have any <4>photography knowledge</4>. From database to live in no time. No investment is necessary (no photo studio with energy-consuming light installations, no tunnel) and no large areas are occupied.
report.processOptimalizationText: The <1>photographic process</1> at the dealership is often not optimally coordinated and it can take days or weeks before a vehicle is finally posted online with photos.
report.processOptimalizationTopRightText: This results in lost sales opportunities, devaluation and slower inventory turnover. As a rule, a car is also fully prepared before being photographed. At this time, it is not yet known whether the vehicle will be sold to an end customer or to a dealer. This is why sometimes too much unnecessary effort is spent on preparation, which lowers the margin. Moreover, the whole process is <1>very time consuming and inefficient</1>.

vinRecognitionText.text1: The APP recognizes the vehicle identification number (VIN).
vinRecognitionText.text2: The <1>artificial intelligence</1> automatically assigns the sequence of photos to the correct folder in the vehicle. There is no need to download, save or sort images. No desktop folders and no data loss.
vinRecognitionText.text3: <0>Synchronization</0> between app and library happens automatically.
vinRecognitionText.text4: It is possible to use our European configurator Opti(Config), which determines the exact equipment of your cars and summarizes it automatically <1>in a sales file</1>.

audit.title: (Opti)audit
